amendment.description: Amendment adds to the water research and development plan an assessment of potential water storage projects that would enhance water supply, water planning, and other beneficial uses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-82 to add to the water research and development plan an assessment of potential water storage projects that would enhance water supply, water planning, and other beneficial uses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
